web-app:
Olas User Web Application
WebappPath /${safe-online.user.webapp.name}/
Path used to initiate a login process. AuthenticationServicePath /entry
Path used to initiate a single logout process. LogoutServicePath /logoutentry
Path used to finalize a logout request sent by the authentication webapp following a single logout process by another application. LogoutExitServicePath /logoutexit
Point of return for the remote device operations. DeviceServicePath /device-landing
ApplicationName ${safe-online.user.webapp.name}
AuthenticationProtocol SAML2_BROWSER_POST
KeyStoreResource safe-online-user-keystore.jks
KeyStoreType jks
KeyStorePassword secret
SingleSignOnEnabled true
CommercialName ${safe-online.commercial.name}
Landing page to finalize a login process. LandingPage /login
Landing page to finalize a logout process. LogoutLandingPage /logout
WicketFilter org.apache.wicket.protocol.http.WicketFilter
applicationClassName net.link.safeonline.user.webapp.UserApplication
configuration ${wicket.configuration}
ExceptionFilter net.link.safeonline.webapp.filter.ExceptionFilter
ErrorPage /error
TimeoutFilter net.link.safeonline.webapp.filter.TimeoutFilter
TimeoutPath /timeout
JAASLoginFilter net.link.safeonline.sdk.auth.filter.JAASLoginFilter
LoginContextName client-login
LoginPath /${safe-online.user.webapp.name}/main
UnauthenticatedPath.1 /${safe-online.user.webapp.name}/theme.css
UnauthenticatedPath.2 /${safe-online.user.webapp.name}/language
UnauthenticatedPath.3 /${safe-online.user.webapp.name}/protocol-error
UnauthenticatedPath.4 /${safe-online.user.webapp.name}/error
UnauthenticatedPath.5 /${safe-online.user.webapp.name}/login
JAASLoginFilter /device-landing
WicketFilter /*
REQUEST ERROR
ExceptionFilter /*
TimeoutFilter /login
TimeoutFilter /device-landing
org.jboss.seam.servlet.SeamListener
com.sun.faces.config.ConfigureListener
net.link.safeonline.webapp.filter.LogHttpSessionListener
LoginServlet net.link.safeonline.sdk.auth.servlet.LoginServlet
ErrorPage protocol-error
LogoutServlet net.link.safeonline.sdk.auth.servlet.LogoutServlet
LogoutPath /userlogout
ErrorPage protocol-error
UserLogoutServlet net.link.safeonline.webapp.resources.DefaultLogoutServlet
LogoutExitPath /logout
DeviceLandingServlet net.link.safeonline.user.servlet.DeviceLandingServlet
DevicesPage /device/devices.seam
ErrorPage device-error.seam
ResourceBundle messages.webapp
Style Servlet net.link.safeonline.webapp.resources.ApplicationStyleServlet
LoginServlet /login
LogoutServlet /logout
UserLogoutServlet /userlogout
DeviceLandingServlet /device-landing
Style Servlet /theme.css
Restrict Viewing XHTML Documents
XHTML *.xhtml

&web-error-codes;
